episode_event_gold_gem/4001_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] started hearing rumors
from [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] friends that some strange men had
been spotted around Pasio.
episode_event_gold_gem/4001_1001_0200_10: Oh yeah, I’ve met someone like that!
episode_event_gold_gem/4001_1001_0300_10:
I met him when I was traveling around the
Sevii Islands!
episode_event_gold_gem/4001_1001_0500_10: Huh. I met someone like that in Viridian Forest.
episode_event_gold_gem/4001_1001_0700_10:
I met someone like that at the Resort Area back
in Sinnoh.
episode_event_gold_gem/4001_1001_0800_10: I wonder if it was the same person.
episode_event_gold_gem/4002_1001_0100_10:
Yeah, I met someone like that in Mauville City!
What about you?
episode_event_gold_gem/4002_1001_0200_10:
Hmm... I did hear rumors about someone like that
who was spotted at a ferry terminal in Alola...
episode_event_gold_gem/4002_1001_0300_10: I wonder if they came from somewhere far away.
episode_event_gold_gem/4003_1001_0100_10:
Yeah, I totally met a guy like that! Two, in fact!
They were brothers, if I remember right!
episode_event_gold_gem/4003_1001_0200_10: Hm... The ones I met were a man and his son...
episode_event_gold_gem/4003_1001_0300_10:
But they did give you something, right? And it was
two of the same thing?
episode_event_gold_gem/4004_1001_0200_10:
There’s a rumor that some strange hikers have
been appearing often on a certain mountain here
on Pasio.
episode_event_gold_gem/4004_1001_0300_10:
It gives me a bad feeling, so I’d appreciate if you
could look into it, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
episode_event_gold_gem/4004_1001_0400_10:
I wonder who or what these strange hikers
might be.
episode_event_gold_gem/4005_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Steven split up
to search for the rumored hikers, until eventually...
episode_event_gold_gem/4005_1001_0200_10:
Hey there! If you’re here on this golden path, that
can only mean one thing!
episode_event_gold_gem/4005_1001_0300_10: You’re here ’cause you want a present, right?
episode_event_gold_gem/4005_1001_0400_10:
We’d be happy to share some with you right
away, but first...
episode_event_gold_gem/4005_1001_0500_10:
We’ve just arrived on Pasio, so we’re new
sync pairs! And we’re itching to battle!
episode_event_gold_gem/4005_1001_0600_10: We’ll give you your present if you can beat us!
episode_event_gold_gem/4005_1001_0700_10: There’s no need to be so shy! After all, we are—
episode_event_gold_gem/4005_1001_0800_10:
Well...I guess right now, we’re just your normal,
average hikers!
episode_event_gold_gem/4005_1001_0900_10: Time for a battle, then! Let’s go, guys!
episode_event_gold_gem/4006_1101_0100_10: Phew, you really are strong! You had us all beat!
episode_event_gold_gem/4006_1001_0200_10:
Which means you’ve earned yourself those Nuggets
we just gave you!
episode_event_gold_gem/4006_1001_0300_10:
We can’t give you any nuggets of wisdom, so
that’ll have to do!
episode_event_gold_gem/4006_0301_0500_10: Um... How do I use them?
episode_event_gold_gem/4006_0401_0600_10: Good question! We’re not quite sure, either!
episode_event_gold_gem/4006_0302_0700_10: Are you sure I can have them?
episode_event_gold_gem/4006_0402_0800_10:
Of course! We’ve got more than enough to
go around!
episode_event_gold_gem/4006_1001_0900_10:
All right! Time to go pass out more of our
Nuggets to everyone else!
episode_event_gold_gem/4006_1001_1000_10: See ya! I hope we meet again!
